# Setup

Install with yarn:

yarn add @dewib/xhr-cache

Install with npm:

npm install @dewib/xhr-cache

Edit nuxt.config.js:

modules: [
  '@dewib/xhr-cache'
]

xhrCache: {
  // Options
}
Edit this page on GitHub
